summary: A young man learns he is the latest in line of a dynasty of ancestral warriors dedicated to guarding a mystic source of cosmic energy, and the time has come for him to take the role.
cast: Jayshree Arora|Veer Arya|Abhishek Bachchan|Jaya Bachchan|Priyanka Chopra|Tána Fischerová|Gaurav Gupta|Vinay Jain|Karan Veer Mehra|Kay Kay Menon|Akhilendra Mishra|Navneet Nishan|Shree Rammy Pandey|Conan Stevens
title: Drona
